com.camerontec.util.files

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.files.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends Object
    Collection of file-related utilities.

        Parameters:
        file - the destination file
        contents - the string to write
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either contents or file is null
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when attempting to write to file

        Parameters:

        url - the URL to read from
        Throws:

        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when attempting to write to read from url or to write to file

      • backup

        public static File backup(File source,
                          String destinationDirectory,
                          String extension)
                   throws IOException
        Makes a back-up copy of a file or directory.
        Parameters:
        source - the file or directory to copy
        destinationDirectory - the directory where the file or directory should be copied.
        extension - the extension to add to the name of the destination file or directory.
        Returns:
        the File object representing the backup copy
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either of source, destinationDirectory, or extension is null
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when performing the copy

      • deleteDirectory

        public static boolean deleteDirectory(File directory)
        Deletes a directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory to delete
        Returns:
        true if the directory was sucessfully deleted, false otherwise; this covers:
        • a location which is not a directory
        • a directory which does not exist
        • permission problems
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if directory is null

      • rename

        public static boolean rename(File from,
                             File to)
        Renames a file.
        Parameters:
        from - the file to rename
        to - destination file
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either file is null

      • expandTarGz

        public static void expandTarGz(File archive,
                               File destination,
                               ProgressReporter progressReporter)
                        throws IOException
        Expands a tar.gz archive in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        archive - the archive to expand
        destination - the destination directory
        progressReporter - a ProgressReporter used to report the progress of the operation
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either of the following occurs:
        • archive is null
        • destination is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if either of the following occurs:
        • archive does not have the .tar.gz extension
        • destination exists but is not a directory
        IOException - if either of the following occurs:
        • archive cannot be read
        • destination or one of its children cannot be written

      • copy

        public static boolean copy(File source,
                           File destination)
                    throws IOException
        Copies a file or directory into another file or directory.
        Parameters:
        source - the source file or directory
        destination - the destination file or directory
        Returns:
        true if the copy was sucessful, false otherwise; this covers:
        • a source which does not exist
        • a source which is a directory and a destination which is a file
        • permission problems
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if source or destination is null
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when performing the copy

        Parameters:
        destinationFile - destination file
        delim - column delimiter
        lines - line values

      • tempFile

        public static File tempFile(String fileName)
                     throws NullPointerException
        Returns, but does not create, a file with the given name in the system's default temporary folder. Schedules the temporary file to be deleted on exit.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file
        Returns:
        a new File
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if fileName is null

      • createTempFile

        public static File createTempFile(String fileName)
                           throws NullPointerException,
                                  IOException
        Creates a new file in the system's default temporary folder.
        Schedules the temporary file to be deleted on exit.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file to create
        Returns:
        a new File
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if fileName is null
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the file

      • createRandomTempFile

        public static File createRandomTempFile()
                                 throws IOException
        Creates a new file with a random name in the system's default temporary folder.
        Schedules the temporary file to be deleted on exit.
        Returns:
        a new File
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the file

      • randomTempFile

        public static File randomTempFile()
                           throws NullPointerException
        Returns, but does not create, a file with a random name in the system's default temporary folder. Schedules the temporary file to be deleted on exit.
        Returns:
        a new File
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if fileName is null

      • randomTempDirectory

        public static File randomTempDirectory()
                                throws NullPointerException
        Returns and creates a new directory with a random name in the system's default temporary folder. Schedules the temporary file to be deleted on exit.
        Returns:
        a new File (which is a directory)
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if fileName is null

      • endOfFilePath

        public static String endOfFilePath(File file,
                                   int depth)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Truncates the end of the path of the given file or directory so that it contains only the given number of levels.
        Parameters:
        file - a file or directory
        depth - the desired depth, which must be greater than one
        Returns:
        a representation of the end of the path to the given file or directory, truncated to the desired depth
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the depth is less than one
